some sounds from freesound.org:

You’re a dog abandoned in the woods. Eat bugs and keep your energy levels up, so you can bark at wolfs and survive the night. Please keep in mind that as you enter the game you take full responsibility for the dog. Take good care of him!

P.S. It’s not an escape room.
